text: Murdoc Faust Niccals (born Murdoc Alphonce Niccals; 6 June 1966) is the fictional bassist for the British animated rock band Gorillaz. He is voiced by Phil Cornwell and was created by Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlett. ==Appearance== Murdoc is portrayed as a middle-aged man with a black mop top haircut, green skin and black eyes. In some cases, especially in phases 1 and 2, his left eye is a dark red or grey colour. The colour of Murdoc's skin has changed over the years from a dark greenish olive to a lime-green colour, however the cause of this is unknown. Category:Animated characters Category:Fictional British people Category:Rock musicians Category:Bassists
title: Murdoc Niccals
